00014 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00015 // Defines and macros 
00016 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 #define EVENT_BUTTON_CLICKED                0x0101
00018 #define EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED    0x0201
00019 #define EVENT_RADIOBUTTON_CHANGED           0x0301
00020 #define EVENT_CHECKBOX_CHANGED              0x0401
00021 #define EVENT_SLIDER_VALUE_CHANGED          0x0501
00022 #define EVENT_EDITBOX_STRING                0x0601
00023 // EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE is sent when the listbox content changes
00024 // due to user input.
00025 #define EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE                0x0602
00026 #define EVENT_LISTBOX_ITEM_DBLCLK           0x0701
00027 // EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION is fired off when the selection changes in
00028 // a single selection list box.
00029 #define EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION             0x0702
00030 #define EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION_END         0x0703

00059 {

00061     DXUT_CONTROL_STATIC,
00062     DXUT_CONTROL_CHECKBOX,
00063     DXUT_CONTROL_RADIOBUTTON,
00064     DXUT_CONTROL_COMBOBOX,
00065     DXUT_CONTROL_SLIDER,
00066     DXUT_CONTROL_EDITBOX,
00067     DXUT_CONTROL_IMEEDITBOX,
00068     DXUT_CONTROL_LISTBOX,
00069     DXUT_CONTROL_SCROLLBAR,
00070 };
00071 
00072 enum DXUT_CONTROL_STATE
00073 {
00074     DXUT_STATE_NORMAL = 0,
00075     DXUT_STATE_DISABLED,
00076     DXUT_STATE_HIDDEN,
00077     DXUT_STATE_FOCUS,
00078     DXUT_STATE_MOUSEOVER,
00079     DXUT_STATE_PRESSED,
00080 };
00081 
00082 #define MAX_CONTROL_STATES 6
00083 
00084 struct DXUTBlendColor
00085 {
00086     void        Init( D3DCOLOR defaultColor, D3DCOLOR disabledColor = D3DCOLOR_ARGB( 200, 128, 128, 128 ),
00087                       D3DCOLOR hiddenColor = 0 );
00088     void        Blend( UINT iState, float fElapsedTime, float fRate = 0.7f );
00089 
00090     D3DCOLOR    States[ MAX_CONTROL_STATES ]; // Modulate colors for all possible control states
00091     D3DXCOLOR Current;
00092 };

00095 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 // Contains all the display tweakables for a sub-control
00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 class CDXUTElement
00099 {
00100 public:
00101     void    SetTexture( UINT iTexture, RECT* prcTexture, D3DCOLOR defaultTextureColor = D3DCOLOR_ARGB( 255, 255, 255,
00102                                                                                                        255 ) );
00103     void    SetFont( UINT iFont, D3DCOLOR defaultFontColor = D3DCOLOR_ARGB( 255, 255, 255,
00104                                                                             255 ), DWORD dwTextFormat = DT_CENTER |
00105                      DT_VCENTER );
00106 
00107     void    Refresh();
00108 
00109     UINT iTexture;          // Index of the texture for this Element 
00110     UINT iFont;             // Index of the font for this Element
00111     DWORD dwTextFormat;     // The format argument to DrawText 
00112 
00113     RECT rcTexture;         // Bounding rect of this element on the composite texture
00114 
00115     DXUTBlendColor TextureColor;
00116     DXUTBlendColor FontColor;
00117 };

00407 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00408 // Structs for shared resources
00409 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00410 struct DXUTTextureNode
00411 {
00412     bool bFileSource;  // True if this texture is loaded from a file. False if from resource.
00413     HMODULE hResourceModule;
00414     int nResourceID;   // Resource ID. If 0, string-based ID is used and stored in strFilename.
00415     WCHAR strFilename[MAX_PATH];
00416     DWORD dwWidth;
00417     DWORD dwHeight;
00418     IDirect3DTexture9* pTexture9;
00419     ID3D10Texture2D* pTexture10;
00420     ID3D10ShaderResourceView* pTexResView;
00421 };
00422 
00423 struct DXUTFontNode
00424 {
00425     WCHAR strFace[MAX_PATH];
00426     LONG nHeight;
00427     LONG nWeight;
00428     ID3DXFont* pFont9;
00429     ID3DX10Font* pFont10;
00430 };

00517 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00518 // Base class for controls

00520 class CDXUTControl
00521 {
00522 public:
00523                     CDXUTControl( CDXUTDialog* pDialog = NULL );
00524     virtual         ~CDXUTControl();
00525 
00526     virtual HRESULT OnInit()
00527     {
00528         return S_OK;
00529     }
00530     virtual void    Refresh();
00531     virtual void    Render( float fElapsedTime )
00532     {
00533     };
00534 
00535     // Windows message handler
00536     virtual bool    MsgProc( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
00537     {
00538         return false;
00539     }
00540 
00541     virtual bool    HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
00542     {
00543         return false;
00544     }
00545     virtual bool    HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
00546     {
00547         return false;
00548     }
00549 
00550     virtual bool    CanHaveFocus()
00551     {
00552         return false;
00553     }
00554     virtual void    OnFocusIn()
00555     {
00556         m_bHasFocus = true;
00557     }
00558     virtual void    OnFocusOut()
00559     {
00560         m_bHasFocus = false;
00561     }
00562     virtual void    OnMouseEnter()
00563     {
00564         m_bMouseOver = true;
00565     }
00566     virtual void    OnMouseLeave()
00567     {
00568         m_bMouseOver = false;
00569     }
00570     virtual void    OnHotkey()
00571     {
00572     }
00573 
00574     virtual BOOL    ContainsPoint( POINT pt )
00575     {
00576         return PtInRect( &m_rcBoundingBox, pt );
00577     }
00578 
00579     virtual void    SetEnabled( bool bEnabled )
00580     {
00581         m_bEnabled = bEnabled;
00582     }
00583     virtual bool    GetEnabled()
00584     {
00585         return m_bEnabled;
00586     }
00587     virtual void    SetVisible( bool bVisible )
00588     {
00589         m_bVisible = bVisible;
00590     }
00591     virtual bool    GetVisible()
00592     {
00593         return m_bVisible;
00594     }
00595 
00596     UINT            GetType() const
00597     {
00598         return m_Type;
00599     }
00600

00602     {
00603         return m_ID;
00604     }

00606     {
00607         m_ID = ID;
00608     }
00609

00612         m_x = x; m_y = y; UpdateRects();
00613     }

00615     {
00616         m_width = width; m_height = height; UpdateRects();
00617     }

00643 
00644     bool m_bVisible;                // Shown/hidden flag
00645     bool m_bMouseOver;              // Mouse pointer is above control
00646     bool m_bHasFocus;               // Control has input focus
00647     bool m_bIsDefault;              // Is the default control
00648 
00649     // Size, scale, and positioning members
00650     int m_x, m_y;
00651     int m_width, m_height;
00652 
00653     // These members are set by the container
00654     CDXUTDialog* m_pDialog;    // Parent container
00655     UINT m_Index;              // Index within the control list
00656 
00657     CGrowableArray <CDXUTElement*> m_Elements;  // All display elements
00658 
00659 protected:
00660     virtual void    UpdateRects();
00661 
00662     int m_ID;                 // ID number
00663     DXUT_CONTROL_TYPE m_Type;  // Control type, set once in constructor  
00664     UINT m_nHotkey;            // Virtual key code for this control's hotkey
00665     void* m_pUserData;         // Data associated with this control that is set by user.
00666 
00667     bool m_bEnabled;           // Enabled/disabled flag
00668 
00669     RECT m_rcBoundingBox;      // Rectangle defining the active region of the control
00670 };
00671 
00672 
00673 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00674 // Contains all the display information for a given control type
00675 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00676 struct DXUTElementHolder
00677 {
00678     UINT nControlType;
00679     UINT iElement;
00680 
00681     CDXUTElement Element;
00682 };

00696         return false;
00697     }

00712 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00713 // Button control
00714 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00715 class CDXUTButton : public CDXUTStatic
00716 {
00717 public:
00718                     CDXUTButton( CDXUTDialog* pDialog = NULL );
00719 
00720     virtual bool    HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00721     virtual bool    HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00722     virtual void    OnHotkey()
00723     {
00724         if( m_pDialog->IsKeyboardInputEnabled() ) m_pDialog->RequestFocus( this );
00725         m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_BUTTON_CLICKED, true, this );
00726     }
00727 
00728     virtual BOOL    ContainsPoint( POINT pt )
00729     {
00730         return PtInRect( &m_rcBoundingBox, pt );
00731     }
00732     virtual bool    CanHaveFocus()
00733     {
00734         return ( m_bVisible && m_bEnabled );
00735     }
00736 
00737     virtual void    Render( float fElapsedTime );
00738 
00739 protected:
00740     bool m_bPressed;
00741 };
00742

00744 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00745 // CheckBox control
00746 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00747 class CDXUTCheckBox : public CDXUTButton
00748 {
00749 public:
00750                     CDXUTCheckBox( CDXUTDialog* pDialog = NULL );
00751 
00752     virtual bool    HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00753     virtual bool    HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00754     virtual void    OnHotkey()
00755     {
00756         if( m_pDialog->IsKeyboardInputEnabled() ) m_pDialog->RequestFocus( this );
00757         SetCheckedInternal( !m_bChecked, true );
00758     }
00759 
00760     virtual BOOL    ContainsPoint( POINT pt );
00761     virtual void    UpdateRects();
00762 
00763     virtual void    Render( float fElapsedTime );
00764 
00765     bool            GetChecked()
00766     {
00767         return m_bChecked;
00768     }
00769     void            SetChecked( bool bChecked )
00770     {
00771         SetCheckedInternal( bChecked, false );
00772     }
00773 
00774 protected:
00775     virtual void    SetCheckedInternal( bool bChecked, bool bFromInput );
00776 
00777     bool m_bChecked;
00778     RECT m_rcButton;
00779     RECT m_rcText;
00780 };

00818 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00819 // Scrollbar control
00820 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00821 class CDXUTScrollBar : public CDXUTControl
00822 {
00823 public:
00824                     CDXUTScrollBar( CDXUTDialog* pDialog = NULL );
00825     virtual         ~CDXUTScrollBar();
00826 
00827     virtual bool    HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00828     virtual bool    HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00829     virtual bool    MsgProc( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00830 
00831     virtual void    Render( float fElapsedTime );
00832     virtual void    UpdateRects();
00833 
00834     void            SetTrackRange( int nStart, int nEnd );
00835     int             GetTrackPos()
00836     {
00837         return m_nPosition;
00838     }
00839     void            SetTrackPos( int nPosition )
00840     {
00841         m_nPosition = nPosition; Cap(); UpdateThumbRect();
00842     }
00843     int             GetPageSize()
00844     {
00845         return m_nPageSize;
00846     }
00847     void            SetPageSize( int nPageSize )
00848     {
00849         m_nPageSize = nPageSize; Cap(); UpdateThumbRect();
00850     }
00851 
00852     void            Scroll( int nDelta );    // Scroll by nDelta items (plus or minus)
00853     void            ShowItem( int nIndex );  // Ensure that item nIndex is displayed, scroll if necessary
00854 
00855 protected:
00856     // ARROWSTATE indicates the state of the arrow buttons.
00857     // CLEAR            No arrow is down.
00858     // CLICKED_UP       Up arrow is clicked.
00859     // CLICKED_DOWN     Down arrow is clicked.
00860     // HELD_UP          Up arrow is held down for sustained period.
00861     // HELD_DOWN        Down arrow is held down for sustained period.
00862     enum ARROWSTATE
00863     {
00864         CLEAR,
00865         CLICKED_UP,
00866         CLICKED_DOWN,
00867         HELD_UP,
00868         HELD_DOWN
00869     };
00870 
00871     void            UpdateThumbRect();
00872     void            Cap();  // Clips position at boundaries. Ensures it stays within legal range.
00873 
00874     bool m_bShowThumb;
00875     bool m_bDrag;
00876     RECT m_rcUpButton;
00877     RECT m_rcDownButton;
00878     RECT m_rcTrack;
00879     RECT m_rcThumb;
00880     int m_nPosition;  // Position of the first displayed item
00881     int m_nPageSize;  // How many items are displayable in one page
00882     int m_nStart;     // First item
00883     int m_nEnd;       // The index after the last item
00884     POINT m_LastMouse;// Last mouse position
00885     ARROWSTATE m_Arrow; // State of the arrows
00886     double m_dArrowTS;  // Timestamp of last arrow event.
00887 };
00888

00902 class CDXUTListBox : public CDXUTControl
00903 {
00904 public:
00905                     CDXUTListBox( CDXUTDialog* pDialog = NULL );
00906     virtual         ~CDXUTListBox();
00907 
00908     virtual HRESULT OnInit()
00909     {
00910         return m_pDialog->InitControl( &m_ScrollBar );
00911     }
00912     virtual bool    CanHaveFocus()
00913     {
00914         return ( m_bVisible && m_bEnabled );
00915     }
00916     virtual bool    HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00917     virtual bool    HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00918     virtual bool    MsgProc( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00919 
00920     virtual void    Render( float fElapsedTime );
00921     virtual void    UpdateRects();
00922 
00923     DWORD           GetStyle() const
00924     {
00925         return m_dwStyle;
00926     }
00927     int             GetSize() const
00928     {
00929         return m_Items.GetSize();
00930     }
00931     void            SetStyle( DWORD dwStyle )
00932     {
00933         m_dwStyle = dwStyle;
00934     }
00935     int             GetScrollBarWidth() const
00936     {
00937         return m_nSBWidth;
00938     }
00939     void            SetScrollBarWidth( int nWidth )
00940     {
00941         m_nSBWidth = nWidth; UpdateRects();
00942     }
00943     void            SetBorder( int nBorder, int nMargin )
00944     {
00945         m_nBorder = nBorder; m_nMargin = nMargin;
00946     }
00947     HRESULT         AddItem( const WCHAR* wszText, void* pData );
00948     HRESULT         InsertItem( int nIndex, const WCHAR* wszText, void* pData );
00949     void            RemoveItem( int nIndex );
00950     void            RemoveItemByText( WCHAR* wszText );
00951     void            RemoveItemByData( void* pData );
00952     void            RemoveAllItems();
00953 
00954     DXUTListBoxItem* GetItem( int nIndex );
00955     int             GetSelectedIndex( int nPreviousSelected = -1 );
00956     DXUTListBoxItem* GetSelectedItem( int nPreviousSelected = -1 )
00957     {
00958         return GetItem( GetSelectedIndex( nPreviousSelected ) );
00959     }
00960     void            SelectItem( int nNewIndex );
00961 
00962     enum STYLE
00963     {
00964         MULTISELECTION = 1
00965     };
00966 
00967 protected:
00968     RECT m_rcText;      // Text rendering bound
00969     RECT m_rcSelection; // Selection box bound
00970     CDXUTScrollBar m_ScrollBar;
00971     int m_nSBWidth;
00972     int m_nBorder;
00973     int m_nMargin;
00974     int m_nTextHeight;  // Height of a single line of text
00975     DWORD m_dwStyle;    // List box style
00976     int m_nSelected;    // Index of the selected item for single selection list box
00977     int m_nSelStart;    // Index of the item where selection starts (for handling multi-selection)
00978     bool m_bDrag;       // Whether the user is dragging the mouse to select
00979 
00980     CGrowableArray <DXUTListBoxItem*> m_Items;
00981 };

01134 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01135 // CUniBuffer class for the edit control
01136 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01137 class CUniBuffer
01138 {
01139 public:
01140                             CUniBuffer( int nInitialSize = 1 );
01141                             ~CUniBuffer();
01142 
01143     static void WINAPI      Initialize();
01144     static void WINAPI      Uninitialize();
01145 
01146     int                     GetBufferSize()
01147     {
01148         return m_nBufferSize;
01149     }
01150     bool                    SetBufferSize( int nSize );
01151     int                     GetTextSize()
01152     {
01153         return lstrlenW( m_pwszBuffer );
01154     }
01155     const WCHAR* GetBuffer()
01156     {
01157         return m_pwszBuffer;
01158     }
01159     const WCHAR& operator[]( int n ) const
01160     {
01161         return m_pwszBuffer[n];
01162     }
01163     WCHAR& operator[]( int n );
01164     DXUTFontNode* GetFontNode()
01165     {
01166         return m_pFontNode;
01167     }
01168     void                    SetFontNode( DXUTFontNode* pFontNode )
01169     {
01170         m_pFontNode = pFontNode;
01171     }
01172     void                    Clear();
01173 
01174     bool                    InsertChar( int nIndex, WCHAR wChar ); // Inserts the char at specified index. If nIndex == -1, insert to the end.
01175     bool                    RemoveChar( int nIndex );  // Removes the char at specified index. If nIndex == -1, remove the last char.
01176     bool                    InsertString( int nIndex, const WCHAR* pStr, int nCount = -1 );  // Inserts the first nCount characters of the string pStr at specified index.  If nCount == -1, the entire string is inserted. If nIndex == -1, insert to the end.
01177     bool                    SetText( LPCWSTR wszText );
01178 
01179     // Uniscribe
01180     HRESULT                 CPtoX( int nCP, BOOL bTrail, int* pX );
01181     HRESULT                 XtoCP( int nX, int* pCP, int* pnTrail );
01182     void                    GetPriorItemPos( int nCP, int* pPrior );
01183     void                    GetNextItemPos( int nCP, int* pPrior );
01184 
01185 private:
01186     HRESULT                 Analyse();      // Uniscribe -- Analyse() analyses the string in the buffer
01187 
01188     WCHAR* m_pwszBuffer;    // Buffer to hold text
01189     int m_nBufferSize;   // Size of the buffer allocated, in characters
01190 
01191     // Uniscribe-specific
01192     DXUTFontNode* m_pFontNode;          // Font node for the font that this buffer uses
01193     bool m_bAnalyseRequired;            // True if the string has changed since last analysis.
01194     SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS m_Analysis;  // Analysis for the current string
01195 
01196 private:
01197     // Empty implementation of the Uniscribe API
01198     static HRESULT WINAPI   Dummy_ScriptApplyDigitSubstitution( const SCRIPT_DIGITSUBSTITUTE*, SCRIPT_CONTROL*,
01199                                                                 SCRIPT_STATE* )
01200     {
01201         return E_NOTIMPL;
01202     }
01203     static HRESULT WINAPI   Dummy_ScriptStringAnalyse( HDC, const void*, int, int, int, DWORD, int, SCRIPT_CONTROL*,
01204                                                        SCRIPT_STATE*, const int*, SCRIPT_TABDEF*, const BYTE*,
01205                                                        SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS* )
01206     {
01207         return E_NOTIMPL;
01208     }
01209     static HRESULT WINAPI   Dummy_ScriptStringCPtoX( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS, int, BOOL, int* )
01210     {
01211         return E_NOTIMPL;
01212     }
01213     static HRESULT WINAPI   Dummy_ScriptStringXtoCP( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS, int, int*, int* )
01214     {
01215         return E_NOTIMPL;
01216     }
01217     static HRESULT WINAPI   Dummy_ScriptStringFree( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS* )
01218     {
01219         return E_NOTIMPL;
01220     }
01221     static const SCRIPT_LOGATTR* WINAPI Dummy_ScriptString_pLogAttr( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS )
01222     {
01223         return NULL;
01224     }
01225     static const int* WINAPI Dummy_ScriptString_pcOutChars( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS )
01226     {
01227         return NULL;
01228     }
01229 
01230     // Function pointers
01231     static                  HRESULT( WINAPI* _ScriptApplyDigitSubstitution )( const SCRIPT_DIGITSUBSTITUTE*,
01232                                                                               SCRIPT_CONTROL*, SCRIPT_STATE* );
01233     static                  HRESULT( WINAPI* _ScriptStringAnalyse )( HDC, const void*, int, int, int, DWORD, int,
01234                                                                      SCRIPT_CONTROL*, SCRIPT_STATE*, const int*,
01235                                                                      SCRIPT_TABDEF*, const BYTE*,
01236                                                                      SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS* );
01237     static                  HRESULT( WINAPI* _ScriptStringCPtoX )( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS, int, BOOL, int* );
01238     static                  HRESULT( WINAPI* _ScriptStringXtoCP )( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS, int, int*, int* );
01239     static                  HRESULT( WINAPI* _ScriptStringFree )( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS* );
01240     static const SCRIPT_LOGATTR* ( WINAPI*_ScriptString_pLogAttr )( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS );
01241     static const int* ( WINAPI*_ScriptString_pcOutChars )( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS );
01242 
01243     static HINSTANCE s_hDll;  // Uniscribe DLL handle
01244 
01245 };

01247 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01248 // EditBox control
01249 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01250 class CDXUTEditBox : public CDXUTControl
01251 {
01252 public:
01253                     CDXUTEditBox( CDXUTDialog* pDialog = NULL );
01254     virtual         ~CDXUTEditBox();
01255 
01256     virtual bool    HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
01257     virtual bool    HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
01258     virtual bool    MsgProc( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
01259     virtual void    UpdateRects();
01260     virtual bool    CanHaveFocus()
01261     {
01262         return ( m_bVisible && m_bEnabled );
01263     }
01264     virtual void    Render( float fElapsedTime );
01265     virtual void    OnFocusIn();
01266 
01267     void            SetText( LPCWSTR wszText, bool bSelected = false );
01268     LPCWSTR         GetText()
01269     {
01270         return m_Buffer.GetBuffer();
01271     }
01272     int             GetTextLength()
01273     {
01274         return m_Buffer.GetTextSize();
01275     }  // Returns text length in chars excluding NULL.
01276     HRESULT         GetTextCopy( LPWSTR strDest, UINT bufferCount );
01277     void            ClearText();
01278     virtual void    SetTextColor( D3DCOLOR Color )
01279     {
01280         m_TextColor = Color;
01281     }  // Text color
01282     void            SetSelectedTextColor( D3DCOLOR Color )
01283     {
01284         m_SelTextColor = Color;
01285     }  // Selected text color
01286     void            SetSelectedBackColor( D3DCOLOR Color )
01287     {
01288         m_SelBkColor = Color;
01289     }  // Selected background color
01290     void            SetCaretColor( D3DCOLOR Color )
01291     {
01292         m_CaretColor = Color;
01293     }  // Caret color
01294     void            SetBorderWidth( int nBorder )
01295     {
01296         m_nBorder = nBorder; UpdateRects();
01297     }  // Border of the window
01298     void            SetSpacing( int nSpacing )
01299     {
01300         m_nSpacing = nSpacing; UpdateRects();
01301     }
01302     void            ParseFloatArray( float* pNumbers, int nCount );
01303     void            SetTextFloatArray( const float* pNumbers, int nCount );
01304 
01305 protected:
01306     void            PlaceCaret( int nCP );
01307     void            DeleteSelectionText();
01308     void            ResetCaretBlink();
01309     void            CopyToClipboard();
01310     void            PasteFromClipboard();
01311 
01312     CUniBuffer m_Buffer;     // Buffer to hold text
01313     int m_nBorder;      // Border of the window
01314     int m_nSpacing;     // Spacing between the text and the edge of border
01315     RECT m_rcText;       // Bounding rectangle for the text
01316     RECT            m_rcRender[9];  // Convenient rectangles for rendering elements
01317     double m_dfBlink;      // Caret blink time in milliseconds
01318     double m_dfLastBlink;  // Last timestamp of caret blink
01319     bool m_bCaretOn;     // Flag to indicate whether caret is currently visible
01320     int m_nCaret;       // Caret position, in characters
01321     bool m_bInsertMode;  // If true, control is in insert mode. Else, overwrite mode.
01322     int m_nSelStart;    // Starting position of the selection. The caret marks the end.
01323     int m_nFirstVisible;// First visible character in the edit control
01324     D3DCOLOR m_TextColor;    // Text color
01325     D3DCOLOR m_SelTextColor; // Selected text color
01326     D3DCOLOR m_SelBkColor;   // Selected background color
01327     D3DCOLOR m_CaretColor;   // Caret color
01328 
01329     // Mouse-specific
01330     bool m_bMouseDrag;       // True to indicate drag in progress
01331 
01332     // Static
01333     static bool s_bHideCaret;   // If true, we don't render the caret.
01334 };
